app_url.description: The Shortcut application url for the Milestone.

started.description: A true/false boolean indicating if the Milestone has been started.

entity_type.description: A string description of this resource.

completed_at_override.description: A manual override for the time/date the Milestone was completed.

started_at.description: The time/date the Milestone was started.

completed_at.description: The time/date the Milestone was completed.

completed.description: A true/false boolean indicating if the Milestone has been completed.

state.description: The workflow state that the Milestone is in.

started_at_override.description: A manual override for the time/date the Milestone was started.

updated_at.description: The time/date the Milestone was updated.

categories.description: An array of Categories attached to the Milestone.

id.description: The unique ID of the Milestone.

position.description: A number representing the position of the Milestone in relation to every other Milestone within the Workspace.

created_at.description: The time/date the Milestone was created.
